# Changelog

# üì¶ 0.4.0-beta

## üì∞ General changes and notes

Summary of changes here!

<details open>
<summary>Github Commits :octocat:</summary>
<blockquote>


- Fixed nametags not showing in multiplayer
- Updated PT_BR localization (PrincessStellar)
- Updated ATMons icons for Title Screen (Uncandango)
- Replaced RCT trainers spawn with AllTheMons (Uncandango)
- Added advancements for defeating ATM Members (Uncandango)
- Fix not droping ATM Members badges (Uncandango)
- Champion Cynthia (Level 66, first encounter) from BSDP series now drops ATM badge box (Uncandango)
- Split ATM Members into Wandering, Custom Gym and Elite Gym categories inside the series (Uncandango)
- Now to fight ATM Members you need to defeat level 87 Champion Cynthia (3rd encounter) (Uncandango)
- Added pokedex uniques catch counter to your name as a prefix (Uncandango)
- Updated quests to reflect above changes (Uncandango)
- Now while holding Trainer Card you have 100x more chance to spawn your next opponent (Uncandango)
- Fixed minor grammatical error (RupinderM)
- Fixed wrong enchantment in quest description (VMargreiter)
- Added PrincessStellar as Content Creator (Uncandango)
- Increased shiny chance when breeding with another trainers pokemon (LobsterJonn)
- Increased shiny encounter chance when holding a Pika Star (LobsterJonn)
- Fixed crash in Cobblemon with brewings stands (Uncandango)
- Added melting recipe for PokeTokens (LobsterJonn)
- Maybe a fix for tokens not being paid out for defeating trainers (LobsterJonn)
- Rebalanced the poke trader trades a little (LobsterJonn)
- Added simpler blank lid ball recipe to prevent confusion (LobsterJonn)
- Added Patrick Staryu variant (LobsterJonn)


</blockquote>

</details>
